医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
补充牛磺酸可减少动脉粥样硬化斑块的形成先前的研究表明，补充牛磺酸可以通过降低脂质水平来减轻动脉粥样硬化。然而，含有牛磺酸的能量饮料已被证明会增加血压，这是动脉粥样硬化的一个关键危险因素。因此，牛磺酸在动脉粥样硬化中的作用仍存在争议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241026/Taurine-supplementation-linked-to-reduced-atherosclerotic-plaque-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241026/Taurine-supplementation-linked-to-reduced-atherosclerotic-plaque-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=10b6426f-efd3-4283-adc7-edcab52a0b58 Sat, 26 Oct 2024 00:15:39 -0400 Taurine supplementation linked to reduced atherosclerotic plaque development
干细胞样 CD4 T 细胞的发现为癌症免疫治疗带来了新希望埃默里大学温希普癌症研究所的研究人员发现了一种新型免疫细胞，称为干细胞样 CD4 T 细胞，它在抗肿瘤免疫中发挥着关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241026/Discovery-of-stem-like-CD4-T-cells-offers-new-hope-for-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241026/Discovery-of-stem-like-CD4-T-cells-offers-new-hope-for-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b57b949d-8f89-452a-9fc8-b272e6ae347c Sat, 26 Oct 2024 00:09:59 -0400 Discovery of stem-like CD4 T cells offers new hope for cancer immunotherapy
新的基于光的技术有望推动非侵入性医疗诊断的进步阿斯顿大学的一位研究人员开发了一种利用光的新技术，可以彻底改变非侵入性医疗诊断和光通信。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/New-light-based-technique-promises-advances-in-non-pressive-medical-diagnostics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/New-light-based-technique-promises-advances-in-non-pressive-medical-diagnostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9971b8d9-50f5-411e-ad13-1f59492e04e0 Fri, 25 Oct 2024 23:22:00 -0400 New light-based technique promises advances in non-invasive medical diagnostics
细胞外囊泡在癌症耐药性中发挥关键作用尽管癌症治疗取得了重大进展，但耐药性仍然是一个持续的挑战。癌细胞通常会对化疗、放疗和免疫疗法等治疗产生耐药性，导致治疗效果降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Extracellular-vesicles-play-key-role-in-cancer-drug-resistance-A-Recent-Review.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Extracellular-vesicles-play-key-role-in-cancer-drug-resistance-A-Recent-Review.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b518330-90b0-4af8-be90-e39fbd2bf11c Fri, 25 Oct 2024 23:16:00 -0400 Extracellular vesicles play key role in cancer drug resistance
研究：尼日利亚艾滋病毒感染者抑郁症患病率很高抑郁症可能导致抗逆转录病毒治疗期间的不良结果，目前的证据表明，人类免疫缺陷病毒（PLHIV）感染者的抑郁症发病率很高，尤其是在低收入和中等收入国家。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Study-High-prevalence-of-depression-found-among-people-living-with-HIV-in-Nigeria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Study-High-prevalence-of-depression-found-among-people-living-with-HIV-in-Nigeria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38490997-adad-440a-8e12-80598d3df4fb Fri, 25 Oct 2024 23:06:30 -0400 Study: High prevalence of depression found among people living with HIV in Nigeria
有脑震荡史的精英冰球运动员心理健康症状加剧瑞典隆德大学的一项新研究表明，有脑震荡病史的精英冰球运动员的心理健康症状更严重。此外，五分之一的女性曲棍球运动员出现倦怠症状，男女均报告饮酒量处于危险水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Elite-ice-hockey-players-with-concussion-history-have-heightened-mental-health-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Elite-ice-hockey-players-with-concussion-history-have-heightened-mental-health-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f208ac7-c7bc-4857-9ea9-a253986571ac Fri, 25 Oct 2024 22:52:00 -0400 Elite ice hockey players with concussion history have heightened mental health symptoms
空气污染控制装置可挽救生命并降低健康成本一篇新评论发现，到 2023 年，发电厂使用这些设备可挽救多达 9,100 条生命，并节省高达 1000 亿美元的医疗费用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Air-pollution-control-devices-save-lives-and-cut-health-costs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Air-pollution-control-devices-save-lives-and-cut-health-costs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a12ba15e-4fe2-4f0a-83fd-7de997377c21 Fri, 25 Oct 2024 22:46:18 -0400 Air pollution control devices save lives and cut health costs
评估 GAAD 对肝细胞癌早期检测的有效性肝细胞癌 (HCC) 的早期检测对于提高慢性肝炎患者的生存率至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Evaluating-the-efficiency-of-GAAD-for-early-detection-of-hepatocellular-carcinoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Evaluating-the-efficiency-of-GAAD-for-early-detection-of-hepatocellular-carcinoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98375e48-56dd-446c-899c-58cb941c0541 Fri, 25 Oct 2024 22:35:28 -0400 Evaluating the effectiveness of GAAD for early detection of hepatocellular carcinoma
内生菌发酵提高草珊瑚中的异佛西丁水平Isofraxidin 是一种在药用植物草珊瑚中发现的重要香豆素化合物，据报道具有抗炎活性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Endophyte-fermentation-boosts-isofraxidin-levels-in-Sarcandra-glabra.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Endophyte-fermentation-boosts-isofraxidin-levels-in-Sarcandra-glabra.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8fe379fd-9fbc-47be-b913-360fe1c0ad2f Fri, 25 Oct 2024 22:30:43 -0400 Endophyte fermentation boosts isofraxidin levels in Sarcandra glabra
活检证实的 MASLD 中晚期纤维化与肝脏并发症有关关于经活检证实的代谢功能障碍相关脂肪肝病 (MASLD) 的美国患者的危险因素和长期结果的数据有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Advanced-太多纤维化-linked-to-liver-complications-in-biopsy-proven-MASLD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Advanced-太多纤维化-linked-to-liver-complications-in-biopsy-proven-MASLD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76f3ab9a-ee33-411f-826a-faa26f20126d Fri, 25 Oct 2024 22:27:10 -0400 Advanced fibrosis linked to liver complications in biopsy-proven MASLD
